TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码，介绍了控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件，它是只是一个占位符的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control, which is just a placeholder, is created on the design surface. 切换回源时查看，请设计时控件，其中包括中的属性的值**属性**网格中，为标记源代码持久保存，并编辑到 Web 页的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control, which includes the values of the properties in the **Properties** grid, is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. ## Examples 本部分提供了两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何扩展类。The first demonstrates how to extend the class. 第二个示例演示如何派生一份类，并将其与设计器相关联。The second demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with a designer. 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 该代码改变的占位符，表示设计图面上的控件并将属性添加到**属性**网格。The code alters the placeholder that represents the control on the design surface and adds a property to the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)] 下面的代码示例演示如何从一份类，并将其与已在前面的示例中定义的设计器关联。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with the designer that was defined in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#2)]

related.span: 演练： 创建基本的控件设计器的 Web 服务器控件

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例类创建的关联的占位符时设计图面上的控件。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates a placeholder for the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 实现设计器属性，以便隐藏关联控件的 属性。

span.span: Implements a designer property to shadow the property of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含与 关联的数据文件的名称和路径。

span.span: A that contains the name and path of the data file associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置要用于关联到的名称和路径包含的 Microsoft Access 数据库的.mdb 文件的设计器中的属性控件。Set the property in the designer to the name and path of the .mdb file containing the Microsoft Access database to use for the associated control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示的名称和路径访问数据文件与之关联的控件在设计时控件占位符中的。The following code example shows how to use the property to display the name and path of the Access data file that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetConnectionString() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetConnectionString () As String

summary.span: 为与此设计器关联的控件获取在设计时有效的连接字符串。

span.span: Gets the connection string that is valid at design time for the control that is associated with this designer.

returns.span: 对于关联的 ， 包含其设计时连接。

span.span: A that contains the design-time connection string for the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法映射设计器的站点，然后使用该控件的属性控件来生成连接字符串属性。The method maps the property of the control to the designer site, and then uses the property of the control to generate the connection string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以显示 Microsoft Access 数据库的连接字符串与关联控件在设计时控件占位符中的。The following code example shows how to use the method to display the connection string of the Microsoft Access database that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 由设计器用于在“属性”网格中添加或移除属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自方法隐藏相应的设计时属性在设计器实现，使用的各种控件属性和要添加属性，或删除它们，从**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid. 有关控件，方法创建设计时属性，以便隐藏控件的属性。For the control, the method creates the design-time property to shadow the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，使属性，只读文件，并显示在**属性**网格。The following code example shows how to override the method to make the property read-only and visible in the **Properties** grid. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)]

para.span: 重写方法可以将属性添加到设计时属性集合或更改它们的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to the design-time property collection or change their attributes.

para.span: 请务必在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

related.span: 演练： 创建基本的控件设计器的 Web 服务器控件
